Articles.Content:
I am very aware of the 131-page discussion on this topic already, but I thought it would be a good idea to start a thread where the focus is on posting images related to the NH mission, and less on discussion.

So, ground rule: Don't post anything without a NH graphic, or a link to a NH graphic.

Pluto on Pluto

Some early, unofficial names of Plutonian geography

And lastly, some size comparisons.

(And mods, if you feel the need to lock this, then do so. But come on! It's New Horizons! Two threads isn't that bad...)
